scripts.build: pnpm run format:write && turbo run build
scripts.build:packages: pnpm run format:write && turbo run build --filter=!./api/** --filter=!./client/**
scripts.build:: pnpm run format:write && turbo run build --filter=!./packages/*
scripts.dev: pnpm run format:write && pnpm with-env turbo dev
scripts.dev:api: pnpm run format:write && pnpm with-env turbo dev --filter=!./client/**
scripts.dev:client: pnpm run format:write && pnpm with-env turbo dev --filter=!./api/**
scripts.depcheck: pnpm run format:write && turbo run depcheck
scripts.clean: turbo run clean && rimraf dist .turbo node_modules pnpm-lock.yaml
